sentences.en: Consult the computer manual if you have a problem.
sentences.cn: 如有问题请参阅计算机用法指南。

sentences.en: Few can equal [ compare with ] her in manual dexterity.
sentences.cn: 论手巧,一般人都不如她.

sentences.en: He bought a manual of car repairs.
sentences.cn: 他买了一本汽车维修手册.

sentences.en: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
sentences.cn: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。

sentences.en: I'm your inferior in manual dexterity.
People in manual occupations have a lower life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 干体力活的人预期寿命较短。

sentences.en: the changeover from a manual to a computerized system
sentences.cn: 由手工操作向计算机化系统的转换

sentences.en: The majority of men there earn their living by manual labour.
sentences.cn: 那里绝大多数人靠体力劳动谋生.

sentences.en: The school offers manual training to the pupils.
sentences.cn: 该校为学生开设手工课.

sentences.en: The use of machinery has superseded manual labour.
sentences.cn: 机器的使用已经取代了手工劳动.

sentences.en: The worst part of the set-up is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.cn: 安装时最糟糕就是操作指南讲述不够清楚。

sentences.en: There is a manual pump to get rid of the water.
sentences.cn: 有一只手摇水泵用来排水。

sentences.en: They do manual labor in the fields all the year round.
They earn their living by manual labo ( u ) r.
This education aimed at combining brain work with manual labour.
sentences.cn: 此项教育的目的在于实现脑力劳动与体力劳动相结合.

sentences.en: Too often he only absorbs half the information in the manual.
sentences.cn: 他对于说明书上所说的经常是一知半解。

sentences.en: You need manual dexterity to be good at video games.
sentences.cn: 玩好电子游戏手要灵巧。

phrases.tran_cn: 安装手册，操作工序说明书；工艺规范
手动变速箱；手排档变速箱；人力操纵传动

trans.tran_cn: 用手的，手工的，体力的，手动的
trans.tran_en: manual work involves using your hands or your physical strength rather than your mind
a book that gives instructions about how to do something, especially how to use a machine
